bio.title: Bio
content: I'm a computer science student from <href>Carleton University</href> with a passion for enhancing other developer's QoL, whether that be though plugins like StrictParams (WIP) or designing well written and easy to read code day to day.
I'm currently on my 3rd year school term looking for a 2017 winter and summer term internship. I've previously worked at %{wealthsimple}, %{shopify}, and %{ibm}
